subject_terms_3: Invitation cards Music Beatty Secondary School
physical_appearance: "The image shows an invitation card. It is rectangular in shape. It has a brown background. ""Complimentary Variety Concert by Ananda Kala Mandram"" is stated. ""In Aid of Tamil is Our Life Fund at Beatty Secondary School Hall (Near Rumah Miskin) on Saturday
subject_terms_1: 8th December 1956 at 8p.m."" is stated. ""Sponsored by Vennila Kalai Arangam"" is stated .  " fund raising
